response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for you at $15,000. I understand its importance and would like to offer it to you at a special price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product offers, I propose a price of $12,000. This not only ensures a substantial return for us but also allows you to acquire an asset that truly meets your needs at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you better.", "product_price": 12000}
